Address.value: 100 CRESCENT CENTRE PARKWAY,SUITE 800, TUCKER, Georgia, 30084, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: GMS Inc is a distributor of specialty building products including wallboard, suspended ceilings systems, or ceilings, steel framing, and other complementary building products. The company serves its products to commercial new construction, commercial repair and remodel, residential new construction, and residential repair and remodel (R&R). Its geographical segment is Central, Midwest, Northeast, Southern, Southeast, Western, and Canada. The company generates maximum revenue from Wallboard products and geographically from the United States.
